name: Damnation Arena
description:
I made this game in two half days while at uni in Falmouth. It was a test to if I could vastly improve my skills for work in the indie industry and also to have a little fun with a basic concept.

I hope you have fun with the crossbow once you get enough blue potions! I'll update it as my progress continues, but I have other ongoing projects that I'm focusing on!

Check out @Borria on twitter to have a look at what I'm working on with two other developers.

Credit to @JakeOfBorria for throwing together a real brief but thematic track for it!
